pregunta1:
From the following list, choose the systems you consider are affected.
Select the corresponding numbers, separated by commas (,).

Enter up to 4 systems, and you can indicate the same system more than once.
pregunta2: To continue narrowing the search, please choose from these categories the one that contains the symptom you thought of. Select the corresponding number.
pregunta3: Your selection has generated a list of symptoms. Please review the list and select the symptom. Select the corresponding number.
final_pathologieslist: Therefore, your condition could be associated with one of the following pathologies:
add_others_sympthoms: Do you want to enter another symptom? (Yes/No)
no_more_systems: There are no more initially selected systems.|
final_conclusion:
We suggest that you access the free platform RDiCManager at https://rdcom.app to continue monitoring your patient.

We invite you to share your access code with other professionals to assist them in diagnosing rare diseases.

I hope I have helped with your diagnostic orientation. Thank you very much for using RDiBot, have a good day.
